Class: SignedInt32

Class: SignedInt32

SignedInt32

Emulates signed int32 behavior

new SignedInt32(initValue)

Creates instance of SignedInt32.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
initValue Number

initial value; will be converted to int32

Members

<static> INT_MAX :number

Max possible value held by this object

Type:
  • number

<static> INT_MIN :number

Min possible value held by this object

Type:
  • number

Methods

dec() → {number}

Decrement the current value and return the result.

Returns:
  • decremented value
Type
number

inc() → {number}

increment the current value and return the result.

Returns:
  • incremented value
Type
number
